title: T200 Boston Nationals SGC 50 - to eBay if not Sold
author: Archive

posts.post_title: T200 Boston Nationals SGC 50 - to eBay if not Sold
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Joe D.
I am going to send this one to eBay as $1 start - no reserve auction -
unless I can strike a deal here first (which I prefer).
spare me from eBay  [IMG]https://www.net54baseball.com/images/happy.gif[/IMG]

Asking $3K but will consider offers.

PayPal preferred.

email: joe@internetville.com

Superior image quality  - not faded like many T200s.

Arguably the toughest card in the set.


[IMG]http://www.internetville.com/images/albums/userpics/10001/T200bostonNat.jpg[/IMG]
